short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block websites and boost your productivity the easy way

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ProductivEasy is a lightweight extension that allows you to block time-wasting sites and reclaim your productivity. With the ability to specify the times and days on which each block is active, you obtain full control over your browsing habits. Simply click on the "P" icon near the address bar to get started once you have installed the extension.
